CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 23, 1946, pg. 3, reads: "Another First - Dr. Leon Waddy, Braddock physician, who was admitted to Braddock General Hospital courtesy staff last week. Dr. Waddy is the first Negro to have such an appointment at Braddock's Hospital. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Dr. Leon Waddy wearing light colored jacket, seated at desk in doctor's office in Homewood
